item.title: Korea’s economy looks like it’s shrugging off Yoon’s impeachment crisis. Don’t be fooled
item.description: War, weak growth, and policy uncertainty around Trump’s return already threaten the Korean economy. An extended political crisis will make things wors...

item.title: The single-most important longevity hack to David Beckham’s routine that keeps him healthy and energetic at 49
item.description: “I've been an athlete for a long time, and I feel that I still am an athlete in my head anyway.”

item.description: The executive order would make crypto a ‘national priority.’

item.title: SEC enforcement blitz targets 7 financial firms as Biden administration winds down
item.description: The SEC disclosed 7 actions against alleged misbehavior with only three days left for the Biden administration.

item.title: ‘Marketing apocalypse’ hits music industry as TikTok ban looms
item.description: In a fragmented music landscape, "TikTok served as sort of the one lightning rod where popularity could actually coalesce into a hit."
